item.title: v.1.8.16
item.description:
BETA Release Notes:
- updated damage image processing to help with slow connections - create damage records immediately, upload images in the background - display full address info on load details for each pickup and delivery section - compress damage images to reduce size and bandwidth
- BUGFIX: fixed damage code issue to help with app crashes - BUGFIX: implement font cache to reduce memory footprint and leaks
* experimental: graceful fallback when google play services not available on older devices
